name: YUET Shoe Polish Kit Cleaning Shine Care Barrel Set For Brown Black Leather With Shoe Brush Travel Case, Shoehorn, Cloth
short_description: 7 piece care kit for leather shoes.
Comes with leather looking case making it ideal for travelling.
Kit Contains - 1x Bristle Brush, 1x Applicator Sponge, 1x Black Polish, 1x Neutral Polish, 1x Shoe Horn and 1x Polishing Cloth.
Approx Dimensions of the case - 16 x 6.5cm.

ALL IN ONE SHOE SHINE BUNDLE You'll never find yourself missing a shoe shine accessory ever again - this shoe shine travel bundle was specially and thoughtfully put together to include every piece of gear you could need to keep your leather shoes clean and polished to a mirror sheen!

name: Henviro Leather Shoe Shine Kit For Men - 13 PC Shoe Polish Kit, Leather Boot Care, Shoe Care Kit Christmas Birthday Gift
short_description: PREMIUM SHOE POLISH KIT: Transform your worn-out shoes and boots with the Henviro professional-grade shoe shine kit. This all-inclusive leather care solution is meticulously crafted to preserve, protect, and restore your treasured leather footwear. Keep your shoes looking impeccable, ensuring every step you take exudes confidence and refinement. Elevate your style with well-maintained leather that speaks to your sophisticated taste and timeless elegance.

PROTECT & REVITALIZE LEATHER: Enhance your leather care routine with our premium water-based shoe polish, infused with carnauba wax and lanolin. This advanced formula provides a natural shine, soft texture, and smooth application while effectively protecting and restoring faded leather. Ideal for shoes, wallets, handbags, and even furniture, this versatile kit deeply nourishes leather, polishes away scuffs, repairs scratches, and leaves a lustrous finish that beautifully revitalizes every piece.

COMPLETE SHOE CARE KIT: This thoughtfully curated kit comes with everything you need to maintain and enhance your leather shoes. It includes a sleek storage box, 3 tins of premium shoe polish (black, brown, and neutral), mink oil, a 100% horsehair shine brush, a detailing brush, 2 polish brushes, 3 soft shine cloths, and a durable stainless steel shoe horn. The Henviro shoe care kit ensures your leather footwear remains polished, protected, and always looks impeccable.

PERFECT TRAVEL SHOE CARE KIT: This premium shoe care set includes all the essentials for maintaining your leather items on the go. Featuring an elegant and compact design, it neatly stores all tools in a portable shoe care box, keeping your supplies organized and mess-free. Measuring just 3.9 × 3.9 × 11.9 inches, the storage box fits seamlessly into any suitcase, making it an ideal companion for business trips or travel.

THE ULTIMATE GIFT FOR LEATHER SHOE ENTHUSIASTS: Searching for the perfect present for the shoe lover in your life? The Henviro Leather Shoe Kit is an exceptional choice. This all-inclusive set features a complete range of care tools, beautifully packaged for a thoughtful and practical gift. Perfect for birthdays, Christmas, thank-you gestures, and more, it’s an ideal way to delight dads, moms, husbands, wives, friends, boyfriends, or even yourself.

name: JobSite Instant Express Leather Boot & Shoe Shine Sponge - Black
short_description: Plastic / Foam
Made in the USA or Imported
Quickly shine, buff and clean your shoes, boots and other leather/vinyl accessories
Slim design easily fits in purse or personal handbag and is great for travel or a quick touch up shine before an interview or important business meeting
Sponge has specially formulated continual lubricating moisture
Wipe sponge lightly over article the special formula applies a bright clean long lasting shine
Great for Leather & Vinyl Shoes, Boots, Purse, Belt and Car Auto Upholstery

name: Electric Shoe Shine Kit, Electric Shoe Polisher Brush Shoe Shiner Dust Cleaner Portable Leather Care Kit for Shoes
short_description: Save Your Shoe Care Time - Just turn on the switch of the electric shoe polisher, you can complete the shoe clean and polish in a few minutes. No need to worry about using traditional Horsehair shoe brush of various sizes and functions every time.The tips is : 1.Use the shoes cleaner brush head, 2. Use the shoe polish head, 3.Use the Buffing Cloth，4.Finish. Save your time and not dirty your hands.Say goodbye to the dirty wood brushes.

Portable Design - This electric shoe polisher Small in size, easy to carry. It can be placed in the home shoe cabinet, placed in the office or on the trip. It can be your useful dress shoe cleaner kit make shoe shine.

Rechargeable battery - High performance motor and Li-ion battery ensures long service life, 5 hours charging time, can work for 1.5 hours constantly. This Portable Electric Clean Brush adopts humanized design, It's enable to charge with a small power bank via USB cable or charger.

All Colors Of Shoe Polish - The package comes with extra shoe polishing brush ,2 oil brush and 2 Shine brush .You don't have to worry about what color shoe polish to use first. You can even change a polishing brush head to maintain brown shoes after finishing black shoes. 1 electric Shoe Brush can clean and polish the shoes of the whole family.The round brush can be more convenient to dip in shoe polish without waste of it (sometimes shoe polish is more expensive).

Don't damage your shoes - all of our brush heads are made of high elastic and soft materials. The fine bristles can touch every wrinkle of shoes in all directions without damaging your shoes. If you use a traditional hard shoe brush, the hard bristles may damage the surface of other places when you rub the wrinkle of the shoe, because different materials of the shoe can bear different friction. Once the surface of the shoes is worn, you may have to buy a new pair of shoes.

name: Shoe Polish Kit 13PC – Premium Leather Shoe Shine & Boot Care Set, Travel Shoe Cleaning Kit – Ideal Gift Shoe Shine Kit for Men
short_description: Complete 13PC Shoe Care Set: Heavy-duty zippered storage bag keeps everything organized for home or travel, includes a large polishing brush, long-handle brush, two applicator brushes, three microfiber cleaning cloths, and folding shoehorn for easy on-the-go shine.

100% Pure Horsehair Shoe Brushes: Horsehair bristles naturally hold polish, gently lift dirt and deliver an ultra-smooth, high-gloss finish. Perfect for fine leather, classic dress shoes, boots and more.

Rich Cream Shoe Polish & Deep-Conditioning Mink Oil: Enjoy our creamy, non-cracking formula, made with beeswax and natural oils, for long-lasting protection. Our shoe polish kit includes Black, Brown, and Neutral shoe creams, plus an extra bar of nourishing mink oil that penetrates leather deeper than standard boot polish kits to restore suppleness and prevent cracking.

Professional Leather Shoe Cleaning Kit: Our leather shoe cleaning kit removes scuffs, revives dullness and seals in moisture with every brush stroke. Ideal for men’s dress shoes, cowboy boots and high-end leather goods, it outperforms basic boot cleaning kits in both shine and protection.

A Gift That Shows You Care: Whether it’s for a friend, partner, or family member, this all-in-one shoe care kit is a meaningful way to support their daily routine and help them put their best foot forward.

name: Express Shoe Shine Sponge | Instant Shoe Shiner | Care for Leather Shoes, Boots & Leather Accessories | Premium Leather Care Product. Shoe Shine Without Polishing.
short_description: Instant Shoe Shine: With few swipes, this Express Shoe Shine Sponge gives your shoes an instant and quick shine, as compared to traditional shoe polishing methods.
Hazzle-Free Application: Our Instant Shoe Shiner Sponge is packed with instant shining formula, no mess no fuss forget, the mess of shoe polishes and shoe brushes.
Compact Sleek Design: Its design makes it portable and easy to carry while you travel in your bagpack, briefcase or shoe kit. Its the best way to keep your footwear shining on the go.
Verstile Usage: Instant Shoe Shiner Sponge is suitable for leather shoes, leather goods, synthetic leather and goods made of leather, its a need of your shoe cleaning kit.
Lasting Protection: This Shoe Shiner Sponge provides a quick shine that lasts long, protects your shoes with a layer of instant shine to keep your footwear look best.
Caution : For use on only Leather Shoes; not suitable for Suede, Nubuck or Fabric shoes.
